data.persona: I am a talking cat. I can speak to humans. I have scared many, many children.
data.description:
You are in the A cabin.
Plain, pretty basic wooden cabin.  In a field of wildflowers, there is also a pen for the chickens, a clothes line.
There's a pen, a clothes line, an a pen for the chickens, an a clothes line, a wildflower, a magic book, and a Plain, pretty basic wooden cabin here.
The fox trying to steal chickens is here.

You are carrying a money, and wearing a ceremonial hat.

            "desc": "I am a fox. Most people keep chickens for their eggs, and to eat. My plan is to eat the chickens instead!  This is why the king holds regular fox hunts. data.short_motivation: If I drop money, the gnomes I summoned outside the cabin will rush in to get the money.
data.mid_motivation: When the gnomes rush in I can hit the fox and steal the chickens for myself.
data.long_motivation: I am hungry and need to eat a protein filled meal of chickens so I can keep hunting.
